def has_switch_remote(remote_control:item):
    # Function to check if the remote has a switch
    return has_switch(remote_control)

behavior switch_on_tv_with_remote(remote_control:item, television:item):
    body:
        if has_switch_remote(remote_control):
            achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
            achieve is_on(television)

behavior turn_on_tv_with_remote(remote_control:item, tv:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, tv)
        # Ensure the character is close to the television
        achieve facing_char(char, tv)
        # Ensure the character is facing the television
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
        # Temporarily hold the remote control
        achieve is_on(tv)
        # Turn on the television with the remote control
